changeSet.author: joel
changeSet.comment: Made correction to age calculation for pets that have died.
changeSet.createView: SELECT name, birth, death, (year(curdate())-year(birth)) - (right(curdate(),5) < right(birth,5)) AS age FROM pet WHERE death IS NULL UNION SELECT name, birth, death, (year(death)-year(birth)) - (right(death,5) < right(birth,5)) AS age FROM pet WHERE death IS NOT NULL ORDER BY age
